name: uncap
content:
uncap verb [T]
(REMOVE CAP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to remove the cap (= lid or cover) from something: He uncapped the bottle and poured out some rum.

uncap verb [T]
(ADJUST MODEM)
to make small changes to a modem (= device for connecting to the internet), especially in order to use the internet without paying a particular internet service provider
